Reviews.Title: Bad phone,
Reviews.Author: Vida Amoh
Reviews.Content: It is not a gsm phone ,I bought it and could not use it in africa,it just did not work

Reviews.Title: All powerful Nokia
Reviews.Author: plantlover
Reviews.Content: This phone became a hand-me-down. I upgraded, my mom kept it. She washed it I don't know how many times in the washer and it just keeps working. Dropped it, sat on it, left it in extreme temperatures, stepped on it, etc.Guess all the stereotypical jokes about the nokias being indestructible are true huh?

Reviews.Title: No use other than just talking
Reviews.Author: Ujjwal Sharda
Reviews.Content: The phone is good only for talking. No applications or games work on it. All keep asking for a smart chip...waste of money

Reviews.Title: No FM Radio!
Reviews.Author: SLC Resident
Reviews.Content: Everything looks good with the product except that the title of the ad is incorrect. There is no FM Radio feature in the phone!

Reviews.Title: Okay buy
Reviews.Author: Nell
Reviews.Content: It was kind of bruised and it looked kind of old but I guess the important thing is that it works.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Easy-to-use, affordable phone in black for voice communications and full range of messaging options, including email, IM, text, and MMS
Built-in web browser for MEdia Net downloads and Internet surfing; EDGE data connectivity
VGA camera for still photos; Bluetooth for handsfree devices; personal organizer
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 384 hours (16 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 2600 Classic Unlocked GSM Phone with VGA Camera, Video, Internet Browser, Bluetooth and FM Radio - Black
